summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies the physical type of pin (audio or video).

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_Tuner
member.summary: Specifies a tuner pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_Composite
member.summary: Specifies a composite pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_SVideo
member.summary: Specifies an S-Video (Y/C video) pin.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_RGB
member.summary: Specifies an RGB pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_YRYBY
member.summary: Specifies a YRYBY (Y, R–Y, B–Y) pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_SerialDigital
member.summary: Specifies a serial digital pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_ParallelDigital
member.summary: Specifies a parallel digital pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_SCSI
member.summary: Specifies a SCSI (Small Computer System Interface) pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_AUX
member.summary: Specifies an AUX (auxiliary) pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_1394
member.summary: Specifies an IEEE 1394 pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_USB
member.summary: Specifies a USB (Universal Serial Bus) pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_VideoDecoder
member.summary: Specifies a video decoder pin.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_VideoEncoder
member.summary: Specifies a video encoder pin.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_SCART
member.summary: Specifies a SCART (Peritel) pin for video.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Video_Black
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_Tuner
member.summary: Specifies a tuner pin for audio.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_Line
member.summary: Specifies a line pin for audio.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_Mic
member.summary: Specifies a microphone pin.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_AESDigital
member.summary: Specifies an AES/EBU (Audio Engineering Society/European Broadcast Union) digital pin for audio.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_SPDIFDigital
member.summary: Specifies an S/PDIF (Sony/Philips Digital Interface Format) digital pin for audio.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_SCSI
member.summary: Specifies a SCSI pin for audio.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_AUX
member.summary: Specifies an AUX pin for audio.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_1394
member.summary: Specifies an IEEE 1394 pin for audio.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_USB
member.summary: Specifies a USB pin for audio.

member.name: PhysicalConnectorType.PhysConn_Audio_AudioDecoder
member.summary: Specifies an audio decoder pin.
